entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
